        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="474" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="474" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.31</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="9664">9,664</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1524"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Green Irish Tweed</b> by <b>Creed</b> is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for men. <b>Green Irish Tweed</b> was launched in 1985. Green Irish Tweed was created by Olivier Creed and Pierre Bourdon. Top notes are Lemon Verbena and Iris; middle note is Violet Leaf; base notes are Ambergris and Sandalwood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Green Irish Tweed by Creed is a classic Fougere fragrance. One of the signature scents of the house of Creed, this "walk through the Irish countrywide" is a favorite of many celebrities. The fragrance is rich, fresh, sporty and unforgettable.</p>

<p>Green Irish Tweed opens with top notes of iris and lemon verbena. The middle notes include violet leaves. The base notes are ambergris and Mysore sandalwood.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">111</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    False claims about hand-picked ingredients
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Not a unique or enjoyable fragrance to some individuals
                </div>

                    Scent may be outdated for some consumers

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="474"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.120.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lemon-Verbena-120.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lemon Verbena</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.84529946162075; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.11.jpg" style="width: 3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Iris-11.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Iris</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.127.jpg" style="width: 4.1rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Violet-Leaf-127.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Violet Leaf</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.524.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ambergris-524.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ambergris</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="474"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='89efb433918004aa6105fb69d2544e44792' slotpayload='{"ct":"iIW9r8uN7aM6mkj9qh5HucAkhOyt8wXDdxOGLVVYXehI2ilu+BR2tzwQuwNOP8kuRqvrEC\/tl7YC6Q6RTSe9CP8bAFi4i2GqUEJ\/gNggN0sqZU93AxGaa03BSgIcCGM111Jh73jDbaZ7vq9Oc8z11klJl9XEZ3BZ1JPWtyoifs3JTEJaHZ4ojkng7fCdSQqsPCrUMDGMjXP2IoZ6Kq3kNsvnbewY\/7DlKOpPJu4st1cvzuqwHLPv+u0LREyv6k0CvbeZTh0vLL3rQ3PPXsvqrP5fB10ZF+\/Id1f5pcn1WfQlL+vaKQc1N0x+MMdEoWxP","iv":"4ebb05dd702f6ef461f80d0cafaad5e7","s":"db946824449689d3"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

</div><more-related-news load_more_title="Load more" :perfume_id="474" :count_news="19" :previous_loaded="10"></more-related-news></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="474"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.48</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="474"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.27</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4" v-pre>

  <span>
    This perfume reminds me of

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2352660" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352660" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hihero"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898197"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898197.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hihero" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nasomatto/Silver-Musk-4295.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4295.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Musk"title="Silver Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352660ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352660" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898197">hihero</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1731916223" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, clean, green classic. Personally I'll stick to Torino 21 for my go to greens but this is worth a sniff. Very fitting for all occasions on warm and hot days and twilight evenings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2352660"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2352660#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349766" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349766" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PWPPWP"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172608"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PWPPWP" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349766ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349766" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172608">PWPPWP</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 06:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First impression, like SMW, this reminds me of the Mefistos, but then this heads in it's own direction.<br />
Have to do a deeper dive on that.<br />
Beautiful, masculine, luxurious smelling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2349766"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2349766#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345231" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GazAdventures"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2283193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GazAdventures" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-607.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.607.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport"title="Allure Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2283193">GazAdventures</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 07:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought Tres Nuit by Armaf because I heard it was a practically identical clone of this one, and after having tried this one, the original, what I can write is that they are incredibly similar, they smell almost the same. The only difference is that this one is more natural.<br />
<br />
Tres nuit seems like a chemical perfume, more generic, while Creed's quality is noticeable as soon as you smell it. The aromas are more defined, better mixed, of a considerably higher quality.<br />
<br />
Personally, I don't like either of these two perfumes. They are smells that seem generic and feminine to me, I don't know if it's because of something I got used to smelling as a child, but it's not a perfume that makes me feel masculine in the least.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2345231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2345231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2344816" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="slyguy96"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2318527"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="slyguy96" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2344816ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2344816" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2318527">slyguy96</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 21:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine a smoother, less aggressive, less chemical smelling Irish Spring soap. It's a pleasant smell, but it's something I'd feel old wearing and at the end of the day it smells pretty similar to Irish Spring. I prefer to not smell like the soap I used in the shower and I try to buy unscented deodorant because to me there's no point in wasting money on cologne if I'm going to be mixing 3 or 4 different scents together from the different hygiene products I use. I could see this making a woman think you just took a shower with Irish Spring. Not bad but not really exciting or an impression maker. You'll just smell...pleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2344816"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2344816#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2343025" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343025" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LeoBoz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2090445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LeoBoz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68415.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Elixir"title="Sauvage Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343025ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343025" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2090445">LeoBoz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green Irish Tweed is the epitome of old-world elegance, the scent of "OLD MONEY" wrapped in fragrance. <br />
<br />
Imagine owning a castle in England surrounded by lush, manicured gardens filled with grand marble statues and ancient trees. This scent captures that vision perfectly, with a green, earthy richness that feels endlessly refined. <br />
<br />
The scent is green and crisp, It doesn’t scream for attention, but rather exudes a quiet, confident aura. It’s a fragrance that subtly commands respect, capturing the essence of class without being overbearing. If you're after something that feels both fresh and refined, Green Irish Tweed delivers it effortlessly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2343025"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2343025#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2340883" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340883" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ZeaMoore4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761519"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761519.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ZeaMoore4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Comandante-16448.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16448.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Comandante"title="Comandante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340883ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340883" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761519">ZeaMoore4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 09:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Every time i put this on, i regret not wearing it more often. That's saying something, as i have a decent collection of 50 fragrances and about 120 decants, all mostly niche fragrances. <br />
Unlike most Creeds, this is still potent in 2024. Longevity and sillage is right where you'd want it for a scent like this. People will smell you from at least an arms length away. If there is a slight breeze, it will spread the scent far and wide. Lasts for an entire workday.<br />
<br />
It starts of fresh, a little citrusy, ozonic and fresh. The violet leaf quickly enters the scene and along with a woody note (probably the sandalwood) gives the scent a fresh, clean, and airy scent. <br />
In the mid, there is a note that reminds me of bread right out of the toaster. Pleasant, and not at all burnt. Along with a salty ambergris it is a delight.<br />
<br />
In the dry down, it keeps the ambergris and violet leaf. It's lost all the citruses, but the green, aromatic and ozonic nuances are very pleasant, airy, and clean smelling.<br />
<br />
It's a classic scent, but not at all old fashioned, old man, or outdated. A young man can Easily pull this off. <br />
<br />
Personal score: 9.25/10. This is in the "legendary" category for me, and will always be a part of my wardrobe. Even if i don't use it as often as i'd like to. Creed at its best.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2340883"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2340883#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339817" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339817" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KerriZ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KerriZ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339817ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339817" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615">KerriZ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, green, ozonic BAM. Why does this just have to be for men? Loved the opening. Wished it lasted longer as the violet leaf takes dominates pretty quickly but does last a good long time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2339817"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2339817#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2334033" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CoolWaterEnjoyer58"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2083648"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2083648.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CoolWaterEnjoyer58" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2334033ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2334033" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2083648">CoolWaterEnjoyer58</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 20:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely adore the smell of this fragrance, I really do. The nostalgic vibe it gives off is fantastic too, like it reminds me of such a specific period in my life. I genuinely don't even know how it's possible. <br />
<br />
But anyways, my question to any of you reading this: Is it possible to get away with this in winter, like even if you spray more of it or something, because I want it so badly, but I don't wanna have to ignore it until summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2334033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2334033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326647" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="corvoattano53"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298077"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="corvoattano53" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326647ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326647" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298077">corvoattano53</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 18:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely love the smell, have some issues with performance though. Doesn't last very long and projection isn't the best. However the smell is more than enough to justify me buying a bottle however. Very green, fresh, and a crowdpleaser.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2326647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2326647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2325596" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325596" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gmelchiade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2248041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gmelchiade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325596ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325596" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2248041">Gmelchiade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 21:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So herbal, love to put it on my working room studio.<br />
Not to wear for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2325596"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2325596#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320975" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320975" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JoshSmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1797683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JoshSmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320975ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320975" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1797683">JoshSmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 12:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells too similar to Cool Water to justify the price. There are definitely differences but not significant enough and not enough jump in quality. It's not like Aventus where the copies smell pretty different and of much less quality. <br />
<br />
It's a great scent and worth buying for collecting and/or for the history, just not worth it for smell alone at this point in time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2320975"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2320975#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318425" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396836">egrorian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 03:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very highly rated by most, personally I think GIT is okay - fresh and refreshing but also massively over-rated (ditto Silver Mountain Water).  I agree with those opining that folks would be as well buying Cool Water and saving themselves a packet - I'm wearing GIT today and suspect most people in vicinity think it's Cool Water anyway.  <br />
<br />
I'll wear GIT on occasion but I find it a bit "ordinary" and personally I prefer a whole load of various popular designer frags to this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; earthy vetiver, lavender, salty ambroxan, lemon peel and airy bergamot. <br />
I've never understood people who see this as an uncomplicated freshie. <br />
This is a deep, earthy and elegant scent for nighttime events. <br />
A bit rough as a composition though, to be honest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2316452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2316452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315741" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2315488" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="viez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1716159.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="viez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2315488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2315488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716159">viez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-14">10/14/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Incredibly photorealistic grassy &amp; ozonic opening which then dries down into a green soapy scent. Super classy, clean, and masculine. Easily one of the more interesting Creed fragrances if you ask me.<br />
<br />
Definitely a bit old school but I wouldn't call it outdated. I'm 25 years old and I enjoy wearing this as much as anyone else. It's a timeless masterpiece in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2315488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2315488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312854" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Expensive? Yes. Worth it? Perhaps.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2311800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2311800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2307537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2307537" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sting Key"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2263115"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2263115.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sting Key" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-890.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.890.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo"title="Polo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2307537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2307537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); Nothing comes close to the refreshing feeling<br />
<br />
update on longevity: Absolutely abysmal. My batch is post 2022 and this thing hardly lasts for 2 hours on skin. Both indoors and outdoors. My dear god. No way I can justify the price. Not at all. If you're on the fence, I would say don't buy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2307537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2307537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301090" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afc_Croatian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afc_Croatian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156">Afc_Croatian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 05:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green Irish Tweed in 2024.<br />
Gifted to me from my gf, this is the perfect gift. Everyone knows GIT's opening by now: Super green &amp; woods. I'm astonished on how Creed made such a green scent have so much depth, the perfect manly scent to me.<br />
<br />
I can imagine how this was in the 80's but to this day it still lives up to being a solid scent in modern times. The violet is what lifts up the vibe to make it smell a bit more expensive, but $245CAD for a 100ml tester bottle is a bargain if you ask me.<br />
<br />
Performance: 4-6 hours<br />
Scent: 9.5/10<br />
Overall: 9.2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2301090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2301090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300196" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rishabh777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2176148"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rishabh777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Boadicea-the-Victorious/Blue-Sapphire-18518.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18518.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blue Sapphire"title="Blue Sapphire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2176148">Rishabh777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 11:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very very clean scent. Unfortunately tried GIT tester &amp; CW bottle side by side. CW opens up a bit alcoholic mist after 30 seconds it gets to the GIT tone of fragrance. Was about to buy GIT, not now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2300196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2300196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298896" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2298896" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kafutul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114452"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.114452.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kafutul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cacharel/Yes-I-Am-48112.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48112.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yes I Am"title="Yes I Am"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2298896ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2298896" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296045" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pancman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2267691"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2267691.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pancman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296045ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296045" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); The smell is nice but there are cheaper alternatives with almost the exact same smell out there. Probably the biggest con is longevity. It lasts for maximum 2 hours even when I stay indoors (at the office or at home). Me and my wife couldn't smell it after 2 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2296045"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2296045#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295825" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But smelling this i could easily rock this every day. Its better made and greener.<br />
<br />
But would i buy it for the high price while everyone might assume i'm wearing cool water? I don't know.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2291061"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2291061#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289552" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfumeboy22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370196"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370196.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfumeboy22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Silver-Mountain-Water-472.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.472.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Mountain Water"title="Silver Mountain Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289552ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289552" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370196">Perfumeboy22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 12:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Haven't smelled Cool Water to compare but I have smelled Bod fresh, and it smells similar to this.<br />
<br />
Opens fresh, green, like 'Tide powder' in the box scent. Then it develops into a fresh, green musky scent. Does not smell dated, and it's similar to Creed Himalaya. I tried it a few years ago and I didn't like it. Now though, I understand what others were saying. Try it for yourself, but this one is a banger. Made in the 80s, but it's definitely timeless. Surprisingly last long for a Creed, I got about 7 hours on skin. You will get compliments.<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2289552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2289552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2289363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2289363" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dnangelone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2260877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2260877.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dnangelone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Bois-du-Portugal-3805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois du Portugal"title="Bois du Portugal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2289363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2289363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2260877">dnangelone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-20">09/20/24 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's Cool Water. Don't let anyone tell you different. (Side by side, it's fancier than cool water, lasts longer, a little more green, a little less aquatic, but... it's Cool Water)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2289363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2289363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2288027" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288027" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288027ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288027" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 07:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In the opening Green Irish Tweed smells pretty Intense, there is a Green/Herbal Freshness but the Woodiness and Spice overwhelms. The Woody note smells like actual wood almost like an antique wood, lending it a bit of a mature and dated vibe. It's definitely not the typical Woody notes you find in modern perfumery. The Spiciness smells very similar to fresh green chili peppers, I'd say it comes kind of close to burning my nostrils, it's that prevalent. I do also detect a bit of an Animalic note as well, which I'm not a fan of in general but the note in here is pretty subtle and tolerable. With the dry-down all the notes become very tame and you're left with a Fresh Herbal Greenness with some Spiciness which is much more tolerable now. As the Dry-Down progresses the scent becomes very minty, I'd say like Menthol and it stays that way until the end. I understand that Green Irish Tweed was released in 1985 and I definitely believe it because it does smell a bit dated but I think it can  still be worn for modern times as well. But maybe it's time for an update to the formulation to bring it up to date. Overall I think the scent is really good. It's an 8.5/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2288027"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2288027#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286488" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286488" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LongNoseLong____"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1844113"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LongNoseLong____" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1844113">LongNoseLong____</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 21:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Incredibly fresh, unique, and imaginative. Excellent evolution of stages from the opening to the dry down. It is The Spring scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2286488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2286488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285696" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Picky_snout"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2205264.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Picky_snout" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-Eau-de-Parfum-81280.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81280.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum"title="Luna Rossa Ocean Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205264">Picky_snout</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 06:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super nostalgia. I think my brother in law wore this religiously back in the day.  All the notes hit the nose very sharp. I spritz this on my wrist and I can still smell it 12 hours later, so excellent longevity and silage. It doesn’t smell bad but I am not a fan. This is just too retro for me. Reminds me of businessmen in movies from the 90’s.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2285696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2285696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285666" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fresh, elegant and sexy. It smells clean and green but not soapy. Smell expensive. Not overly sweet. Thumbs up!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2285666"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2285666#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283903" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
