If you want a 5 dollar alternative or even something to wear with GIT, Gillette Cool Wave Aftershave Splash goes in this direction.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2190438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2190438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2189295" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brb2503"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brb2503" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2189295ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2189295" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2124317">Brb2503</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Even as a 18 year old guy I absolutely love this fragrance. When I close my eyes and smell this stuff I can see wet green leaves in front of me. The performance I get is amazing eventhough mlst stuff doesn't last on me, I spray this on at 8 in the morning and can still catch whiffs of it 12 hours later. At first I was skeptical if it's worth the money but out of all creeds this one probably is the most. 100% my new signature scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2189295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2189295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185702" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185702" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venussiandehermes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2107198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venussiandehermes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185702ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185702" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198">venussiandehermes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 03:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has the maximum level of elegance possible for a summer scent. Freshness and a perfectly balanced powderiness. As someone who has tested Cool Water before, I can admit that it is similar. But G.I.T. is pure gentlemanliness.<br />
<br />
I discover a new side of this fragrance every time I wear it. When I inhale the fresh greenery and powdery scent, it gives me serenity and peace. This scent really smells like the scent of a confident man who has achieved a lot in life and has achieved inner peace and satisfaction. I experience similar feelings in another classic, Terre D'Hermes. A strong man who does not work to please anyone. But the difference between them is that Terre D'Hermes does not wait to be accepted with careless self-confidence, But G.I.T. It presents self-confidence to people with respect, kindness and elegance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2185702"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2185702#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182842" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Literally 1984"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2158041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Literally 1984" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182842ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182842" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158041">Literally 1984</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-09">06/09/24 06:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now to be clear before I say anything, fragrances are completely subjective and I am just some random on the internet so take what I think of it (and anyone else) with a grain of salt. Go try it out yourself, and don't just spray it on a strip or into the cap, actually put it on you and wear it throughout the day to decide if this is really for you, as creed isn't exactly cheap. <br />
<br />
Scent 4/10<br />
I don't get this scent at all, I am an enjoyer of older/more mature scents even those from creed, I really like Bois Du Portugal, not something I would wear mainly because of the lavender scent (maybe when I'm 60+) but still lovely, royal oud (my favorite scent I have ever got my nose on and worn) so on and so forth. But to me, this is just so boring. It's so clean, almost soapy and I am not a fan of florals neither and that is what I get even after 30+ minutes, and even after that I still get hints. The dry down is much nicer though, still not a huge fan but I do like sandalwood and I do indeed get that, but it's just too green with nothing else very interesting, almost like some damp weeds. Just not for me I guess.<br />
<br />
Longevity&amp;Projection<br />
It does last for a decent some time, I can't really put a specific number on it but if I were to try, probably 6 hours of decent projection with 3 sprays.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2182842"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2182842#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181641" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2181641" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DylanMcKay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/945570"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DylanMcKay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2181641ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2181641" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); Very safe. Lasts long. But the problem is that it’s incredibly dated. It throws me back to the 90’s and the era of Cool Water.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2181641"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2181641#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180574" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Never Dissappoints when it comes to the smell. Such a classy Fresh fragrance without smelling outdated. Only drawback for me is that it doesn't last as long as I would like. If not I'd give this a 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2180574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2180574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This fragrance is not good but at least not the worst, I smelt this at the mall, actually quite excited to smell it but was let down by the smell. This is just not for me I know some people like but I do not. It for me smells very artificial and low quality. But now this is the thing that makes me really dislikes this fragrance… it’s about 150 pounds for 50ml bottle! It’s not even niche quality no where near and they have the confidence to price it at 150 pounds! Geez. One thing I will say though is that when I sprayed at the mall I could smell it for a long time and i could also smell it far away, only thing is i don’t want to smell this! At least it’s better than Viking though…<br />
<br />
Longevity - 8/10<br />
Silliage - 8/10<br />
The scent 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2177426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2177426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176965" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176965" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vvsberg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1993611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1993611.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vvsberg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176965ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176965" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1993611">Vvsberg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s blind but worthy it just smells good clean everyone will like it. Very easy to wear!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2176965"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2176965#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176170" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentedJuan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081042"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2081042.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentedJuan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176170ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176170" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081042">ScentedJuan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-02">06/02/24 19:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this last year and loved it. I heard Aspen smelled similar so I initially opted for that instead for obviou$ rea$on$. But that GIT sample taunted me everytime I smelled it. While I do really like Aspen and smell the similarities. Green Irish Tweed is on another level entirely. Far more nuanced, rich and developed. The structure and higher quality ingredients are evident factors in allowing the character of this profile to be experienced in vivid detail.  <br />
<br />
When speaking of a 38yr old fragrance, I doubt much can be said that hasn't been said already. I'll share my impressions of the scent still. I'm obviously a fan. I know unisex is the thing today but this is flat out masculine. The scent is super classy and has a  calm confident vibe that doesn't need to shout to be noticed. Beyond the calm, well groomed, grassy, floral fields are hints of an alluring bit of mystery and sex appeal. But there's a sense of ease and nobility even in this. A sexiness that's neither obscure nor explicit but simply there as a natural facet. At no point does it come off as trying too hard to be any of these things. It feels natural and cohesive in all that it presents and inspires. I feel confident wearing it. Imo GIT is distinguished among fragrances that are similar to it and those that are not.<br />
<br />
Right after Royal Oud, Green Irish Tweed is one of my top performing Creed's. If you're looking for complements, this definitely draws them. I got a good 10 to 12+hrs with 5 to 6 sprays on the first 3 wearings. But on my 4th and 5th wearing I cut it down to 3-4 sprays as this stuff is strong and seems to be getting stronger. With just 3-4 sprays I still hit the 9 to 10+hrs range in longevity. Projection seems to be atleast arms length for the first 3½ to 4 hours. Silliage is beautiful. I easily smelled it on and around me the whole day whether I was still or moving. But 3 to 4 sprays is the sweet spot for me. <br />
<br />
The performance I get from so little is looking like I'll have this bottle in rotation for a long time!<br />
<br />
No regrets 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2176170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2176170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175203" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Palmsquad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2020295"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2020295.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Palmsquad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175203ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175203" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2020295">Palmsquad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 22:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First smell.. just like Cool Water. I was like, yup. I see what they mean. Cool water is a good clone. <br />
Then after 30 mins or so, I was like, actually I totally get the Irish Spring soap thing too. <br />
Then after an hour I had enough. It’s too strong! Almost nauseating. <br />
Someday I’ll try this all day with one or two sprays, but I’m a little cautious about it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2175203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2175203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174411" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290480">soumbanerjee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 06:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the BEST in my opinion. Love the DNA. Fresh, green a bit soapy that starts with a bitter citrus freshness. I swear by this. All time favourite. Love the invigorating opening and stays easy 6-7 hours on my skin in the hot Indian climate. This is the only fragrance I apply on my skin TBH.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2174411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2174411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174282" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ryan1_y"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1567040.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ryan1_y" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174282ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174282" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1567040">Ryan1_y</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 03:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can someone delete the nonce below. Writing happy pride on every fragrance. Safe bet if not used heavily.  $$$<br />
I pick up pine, moss, eucalyptus, lavender, bitter citrus  <br />
<br />
Fougere. <br />
<br />
What came to mind for me…<br />
<br />
A guest or two at big outdoor wedding (that guy).<br />
A personal injury lawyer (contingency plaintiff only practice) consultation with client <br />
A country club locker room<br />
The head of a convention and visitors bureau attending a new monument dedication. <br />
Sales manager at a Jaguar dealership<br />
A barber shop <br />
The office <br />
A good friend's birthday celebration <br />
Traveling by train daytime<br />
A chess game in a park<br />
A stroll most anywhere <br />

Would not use on/at…<br />
A date (she may say ‘you smell like my dad’, not a good start!)<br />

The movies<br />

On my skin this fragrance is very nice, in the first 2 hours it is a sweet floral fragrance and sort of smells like mancera of the wild. Then It dries down to a spicy fragrance. I recommend this fragrance to anyone who likes fragrances which reminds them of the outdoors and likes wearing unique scents.<br />
<br />
Smell 9.2/10 <br />
Sillage 7.5/10<br />
Longevity 8.4/10<br />
Bottle 9/10<br />
Is it worth the price: yes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2165306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2165306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164587" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160545" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreshLiving"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043744"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1043744.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreshLiving" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1043744">FreshLiving</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 19:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Anyone else think the performance is abysmal on this? I honestly get 2 hours and then a faint skin scent. Which is horribly sad because it’s simply a beautiful fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2160545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2160545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blisscentual"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blisscentual" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137774">Blisscentual</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 18:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As an avid colognoisseur since 2016, I find Green Irish Tweed to be an exquisite and visionary parfum art created by master perfumer Monsieur Pierre Bourdon.  To me, this creation gives the gentle confidence of a veteran sea captain embarking on a journey, setting sail at dawn. An awakening of scents and senses through the envelopement of coastal blooms within a cool salty mist, during this first hour of the journey.  You slowly drift through the moss and sea(t)weed laden seascape, feeling enshrouded by a lush verdant tranquility, the sun starting to lift that cooler marine layer and brighten your day.  As you make your way across the waves and skies, towards the isles of wonder, you are continually comforted by wafts of salty breeze scenting up the wooden treasures of that legendary vessel carrying you (and this beautiful fragrance).  Bon Voyage!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2160521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2160521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2157715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2157715" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="D. Gilmour"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1934450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="D. Gilmour" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2157715ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2157715" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1934450">D. Gilmour</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-16">05/16/24 04:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not modern and not dated, this perfume is just timeless. And absolutely fabulous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2157715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2157715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2150074" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="-Specs-"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985450"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1985450.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="-Specs-" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2150074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2150074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1985450">-Specs-</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-08">05/08/24 19:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First let me say that I’m not really a creed fan. I think everyone of their offerings I’ve smelled are overhyped and overpriced. The bottles are cool… but meh. However green Irish tweed is amazing. It’s fresh, green and soapy. This screams sophistication and intelligence. Yes, it’s slightly old fashioned but that’s a good thing. Also clear water smells nothing like this. That’s like saying a ford is like a Porsche. This would be the only creed fragrance I would spend the 400 dollar price on. Definitely a mature fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2150074"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2150074#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2149042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2149042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jaywizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2095800"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2095800.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jaywizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2149042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2149042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2095800">jaywizard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 21:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance radiates nostalgia. It smells like when I was 6 years old, digging through my dad's medicine cabinet and finding this dark green aftershave of his. Although this has a strong backing of mint in the opening, immediately I thought it had to have spearmint in some sense. Drying down, that mintiness goes away and settles into a dense dewey mossy fresh foliage that smells ultra masculine, ultra mature. As with the other two Creed frags I've sampled (VIW and Aventus), this has that unique "airiness" to it as well. Unfortunately however, this also only lasts about 3-4 hours on my skin, the same as the two other Creed fragrances. This is also the most synthetic smelling of the trio I've sampled so far, and seems like it could be easily replicated at a lower cost (minus the "airy" signature Creed note, which I've yet to positively identify).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2149042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2149042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148499" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148499" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bader7II"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2049092"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2049092.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bader7II" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148499ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148499" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2049092">Bader7II</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 09:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If this fragrance was a song it would be floral shoppe by macintosh plus, amazing song, sounds so nostalgic yet so timeless, same thing with this fragrance, it smells nostalgic yet it’s very timeless (i bought a clone of this but it’s not on fragrantica but as far as i can tell this clone is at least 95% similar)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2148499"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2148499#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148001" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148001" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emanali443322t"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="emanali443322t" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148001ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148001" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115611">emanali443322t</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 20:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love this fragrance, especially when you can snag it at a good price from discounters. If you're a fan and it fits your budget, don't hesitate to go for it. Compared to Tres Nuit, I find this one to offer more complexity and development, and it performs even better on my skin. When pitted against Cool Water, there's no contest—this fragrance wins hands down.<br />
<br />
I've had the chance to compare current batches with older ones, and they're practically identical. This fragrance has been preserved exceptionally well. It performs wonderfully without being overpowering to others, making it suitable for all occasions. If it weren't for the price, I'd wear it every day without a second thought.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2148001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2148001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147397" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147007" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moyashi04"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1974296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moyashi04" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147007ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147007" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296">Moyashi04</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 21:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I see that this fragrance gets compared with a few other fragrances. Forget about anything you've heard of. This is "the" fragrance. It's classy. It's mature. It's masculine. It's sophisticated. It's anything a gentleman can ask for. It is amazing and could suit you better than anything but please, please, wear this if you can rock it. Not if you think so, do it if you can actually rock it.<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2147007"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2147007#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146458" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146458" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KingKilo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2032212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KingKilo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nasomatto/Silver-Musk-4295.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4295.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Silver Musk"title="Silver Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146458ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146458" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032212">KingKilo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 09:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green Irish Tweed is a very interesting fragrance. It's a bit like Aventus, but on steroids. It's longer lasting, better sillage, twice as "green" smelling as Aventus and more mature.<br />
<br />
It definitely smells like a beautiful spring morning, mountain side. But on the other hand, it also reminds me of my high-school days.<br />
After PE, when all the boys went back to the lockerroom, and everyone would spray on their deodorants and Eau de toilette that they stole from dad... the blend of all that, also kind of smells like Green Irish Tweed. I know it might not sound that alluring, but I mean it in a pleasant sort of way.<br />
Hard do describe.<br />
<br />
Overall, 8/10 will buy again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2146458"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2146458#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145905" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bray6"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074271"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2074271.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bray6" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2074271">bray6</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 17:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>straight grass clippings.. dont waste your money. 1/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2145905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2145905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145327" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145327" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Psalzarulo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Psalzarulo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145327ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145327" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203">Psalzarulo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 06:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first spray is a grassy, fresh, almost celery-like bright citrus. You can guess by the name that it's going to lean towards fresh, verdant, clean notes. I'll be honest, in that grassy scents don't really do much for me, and I've found the Creed scents I've samples to be generally over-hyped for what they actually offer compared to other brands. I'm still waiting to find a creed scent that "wows" me the same way as other niche like PdM and Tom Ford have. <br />
<br />
I will say that if you are an enjoyer of fresh, green, grassy scents; or even fresh blue scents, this would certainly be something for you to try. It's clearly high quality in its ingredients. As far as notes go, I think this benefits from its simplicity, but the most prominent is grassy lemon verbena.<br />
<br />
As far as wearability, this is as universal a scent as you could find, although the bright, fresh notes do lend more to warmer, sunnier occasions. Either way, this could definitly be an everyday scents for the office, date night, informal, etc.<br />
<br />
Overall, this is just a really uninspiring scent and leads me more to believe I'm just not part of Creed's target market. I could probably find something similar-smelling at the discount rack for a fraction of the price, let alone by a mainstream designer for less than half of the price. 7.5/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2145327"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2145327#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's the house that created Green Irish Tweed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2143806"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2143806#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138603" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138603" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Huss_aladdin27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2104829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2104829.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Huss_aladdin27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138603ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138603" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2138603"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2138603#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2134696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2134696" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nerdboy83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753665.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nerdboy83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2134696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2134696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753665">Nerdboy83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-24">04/24/24 05:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a fantastic woody, slight musky, floral fragrance that was nicely blended. This aroma smell mature, soft, calm, casual, inviting, &amp; fresh. This fragrance is definitely a crowd pleaser, attention grabber, and a panty dropper. Even if you don't receive any compliments. Believe me, women will stand more closer to you more than usual &amp; look in your direction more. This is a Spring/Summer scent. I honestly don't believe this would perform &amp; unfold well in cold weather. <br />
<br />
The longevity is fair. I usually layer my cologne with essential oils that are inspired by the fragrance itself to get the performance that I truly desire without having to keep overspraying. <br />
<br />
I don't see much (Just little) comparison to cool water. Both fragrances have that gentleman aura touch to it. Cool water smell more oceanic. Green Irish Tweed smell more outdoorsy. <br />
<br />
I would only reach for this. <br />
<br />
1)Spring/Summer.<br />
2)Daytime. <br />
3)Job/Office.<br />
4)Outdoor activities. <br />
5)Dressing casual. <br />
6)Hanging with the fellas. <br />
7)Running a few errands. <br />
8)The gym. <br />
<br />
I wouldn't necessarily reach for this. <br />
<br />
1)Going clubbing/Partying atmosphere. <br />
2)Nights/Evenings.<br />
3)Fall/Winter. <br />
4)Attending a formal event. <br />
5)Dressing sophisticated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2134696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2134696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
