I tried to wash it off, but it just sticks to me. My roommate gagged when he smelled it. There is no reason for this to cost nearly as much as it does.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2132115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2132115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Geory"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2042366.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Geory" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042366">Geory</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like fresh grass and slight hint of cow piss</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2131298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2131298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128438" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SaltyCucumber69"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2062749"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2062749.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SaltyCucumber69" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128438ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128438" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2062749">SaltyCucumber69</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like mowing the lawn</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2128438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2128438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128432" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bader7II"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2049092"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2049092.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bader7II" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128432ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128432" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2049092">Bader7II</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So, i’ve been looking in my dad’s old stuff, and there it is, Green irish tweed By Creed. Empty. And i asked my dad; dad, is this the real green irish tweed ? He said; well, yes but, it’s very old, i was young, and that was my favorite fragrance at that time, not anymore tho, I don’t think you would like it either. And so i kept it in my room just for fun, timeless piece of art of a bottle, it’s a pleasure for me to keep it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2128432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2128432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128363" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vorpal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1821877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1821877.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vorpal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Percival-51037.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51037.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Percival"title="Percival"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1821877">Vorpal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 07:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I decided that Green Irish Tweed will become my "dad-fragrance", exuding a timeless allure and maturity that I aspire to one day fully embrace.<br />
<br />
Imagine a stroll through a rainy forest—fresh, vibrant, and invigorating. That's the aura of Green Irish Tweed. Its green, bright, and clean composition evokes a sense of refinement akin to a classic gentleman's scent. Versatile enough for the office, yet fittingly refreshing for summer and spring, adding a touch of class to any occasion.<br />
<br />
The only downside is Davidoff Cool Water's striking similarity, coupled with its significantly lower price point. Nonetheless, Green Irish Tweed reigns supreme in my opinion and surpasses similar fragrances, like Chanel Platinum Égoïste, with its timeless charm and sophistication.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2128363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2128363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127030" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmberNote"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmberNote" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055164">AmberNote</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 23:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got a decant of this and have to say that despite being a fresh fragrance, the performance is Beastly!  Stick with 2-3 sprays unless you're going to be outdoors.  The aquatic notes seem to settle down after an hour or so, and what you're left with is a beautiful citrusy violet and woody freshness that projects well with an impressive sillage.  Edit:  Sadly, about 4 hours in, the naturals have subsided, and the ambroxan is too strong, even headache inducing.  Very very powerful fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2127030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2127030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124887" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025392">micholas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-14">04/14/24 09:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coolwater ruined my experience of this fragrance to be honest. I love GIT and I don’t hate Coolwater, but every time I wore this someone would say to me ‘you’re wearing CW today, haven’t smelt that in ages’.. In the end it got very annoying and I stopped wearing it. I don’t know how anyone can review Green Irish Tweed without mentioning the Coolwater connotations. Even though CW was a rip off, they smell ridiculously similar and in a blind test I think most of the public wouldn’t be able to tell them apart.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Deep and sensational, emotive and grassy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2120220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2120220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2116485" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2116485" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Darkstar _ Destroyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1305348.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Darkstar _ Destroyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2116485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2116485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1305348">Darkstar _ Destroyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-06">04/06/24 14:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If only you could bottle the boundless elegance of a gorgeous Spring morning ... well look, they did.  Perfection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2116485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2116485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115545" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FuzzyWig"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076447"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2076447.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FuzzyWig" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2076447">FuzzyWig</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you are looking for a green fragrance to add to your collection , GIT and you're done. In the end, I am only allowed (and I concur) to have 4 fragrances sitting on the dresser.  I have decided to rework my collection . A green , a woodsy oud, a freshie for summer ,and the all season signature, wear it anytime fragrance. So far we have GIT as the green and a wonderful sexy , smooth , well performing woody/ Oud you do not see on Fragrantica as of this writing. It is Ahmed Al Maghribi Summer Oud. It was a blind buy for me and it is a keeper. The search continues.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2115545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2115545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114861" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114861" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bierhaus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bierhaus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114861ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114861" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324156">bierhaus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 02:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is it just me or is recent GIT much weaker than say 3-4 years ago? The decant I purchased about 3-4 years ago was insanely strong with the green opening. It would wake me up with how strong it was and it lasted. It was like a shimmering green emerald was placed in my head and was projecting energy outward.<br />
<br />
The recent decant I purchased smells strongly of Irish Spring soap at opening but that goes away within a couple minutes, and what's left smells like that cheap crap from Armaf Tres Nuit mixed with the aquatic nature of Cool Water from the Lancaster era. Sheesh...Creed disappoints these days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2114861"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2114861#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113531" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113531" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance Goblin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044284"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2044284.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance Goblin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-41698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking"title="Viking"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113531ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113531" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044284">Fragrance Goblin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 18:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells of a fresh mountain meadow with sweet purple flowers set against the sea. <br />
<br />
What are you waiting for?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2113531"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2113531#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112494" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112494" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="weazal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697686"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1697686.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="weazal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112494ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112494" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1697686">weazal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 22:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Applies as an amped up version of blue scents.<br />
<br />
Frustrating that it’s called “green” when the dominant note is clearly marine. What green there is reads as the sour tang of new twig sap. A classier, deeper version of the generically fresh masculine scents that dominate department stores. Woodiness adds depth.<br />
<br />
Overall, projects in a way that’s hard not to like - if it weren’t so familiar. Well done, but too safe. Dry down is well balanced fresh shampoo. Impressively made, but too common/safe.<br />
<br />
EDIT: Skin ruined it, but fabric showed what I was missing. Sprayed on clothes and it became less blue, more sharp green pepper/menthol barbershop. Despite being dated, it's complex, heady, spicy snow. Cucumber spa water with fresh green jalapeno and clean laundry. The green element is dewy shampoo. Gorgeously crafted, but too soft.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2112494"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2112494#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1701040">stardust_ziggy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-02">04/02/24 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has an unapologetic greenness to it and some type of subtle floral energy mixed with cleanliness. Leans masculine. Love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2112139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2112139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2111329" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111329" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vvsberg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1993611"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1993611.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vvsberg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111329ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111329" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1993611">Vvsberg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 20:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Greatest Green fragrance of all time!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2111329"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2111329#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110558" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110558" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ourfrank"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/912161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.912161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ourfrank" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-Intense-45396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme Intense"title="Prada L'Homme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110558ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110558" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/912161">Ourfrank</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 05:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive wanted to like this for years but sadly I just cant. The green grassy smell is just so aggressive. When I smell it I feel like I struggle to get a breath. To be fair I hated Cool Water in the 90's as well. I dont get the appeal on this one. It just feels like its missing something to make it shine. Very Meh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2110558"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2110558#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108787" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2108787" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TBonetheFella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710835"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1710835.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TBonetheFella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jorum-Studio/Spiritcask-79477.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79477.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spiritcask"title="Spiritcask"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2108787ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2108787" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1710835">TBonetheFella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The smell of walking through a freshly trimmed and pruned garden during a warm summers morning. Life is good.<br />
<br />
You are smacked with a refreshing blast of dewy and green fresh cut grass and citrus-y yet smooth lemon verbena when you first spray this on. Then as it dries down the citrusy green notes partner up with ozonic and powdery violet leaves with a nice backing of lightly creamy and woody sandalwood and ambergris. Refined yet casual. Sexy yet gentlemanly. Nostalgic yet timeless. <br />
<br />
This is really really nice. Super grounding and clean that can be worn in nearly any daytime situation. While I am very familiar with "Cool Water", I never really got into it because the opening is really synthetic to my nose. This is much more "natural" smelling to me and because of that, it is much harder for anyone to actively dislike this. My biggest complaint about this fragrance, similar with all Creeds, is that it is so wildly overpriced that I seldom recommend it to people my age (20 as of writing this), because we are all broke college kids who would rather spend our money on beer or food than a 50 mL bottle that we'll go through in half a year. <br />
<br />
Respectable performance of 8+ hours with moderate projection for the first 4-5 hours depending on what you're doing.<br />
<br />
10/10. My favorite creed. Signature scent worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2108787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2108787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2105623" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2105623" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joNick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021650"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2021650.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="joNick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2105623ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2105623" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2021650">joNick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-27">03/27/24 04:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The latest F batch is good in performance, longevity. For those who compare cheaper imitations/inspirations - GIT and Cool Water are like the hand made Croissants with the best gourmet ingredients at an artisan bakery vs the factory produced, packaged bun sold as croissants in supermarkets.<br />
For me this is a confidence superdose, I like it at work, on a Sunday brunch and yes, on a night out too.<br />
It separates the men from the boys.<br />
Exudes pure class and sophistication.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2105623"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2105623#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2104664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2099913" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="edinac"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2058941"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2058941.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="edinac" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2099913ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2099913" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2058941">edinac</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 15:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know I’ll be in the minority here but I actually dislike this one.  I find the opening to be a very odd combination of citrus, and also strangely off putting metalic scent that I can’t identify.  I had a coworker actually say that it smells like dirty coins.  That’s not even the worse part.. it’s the longevity and projection, or should I say lack thereof.  I found myself having to over spray this just to get barely 3-4 hours of fragrance.  I’m willing to chalk this one up to a bad batch, but I’m selling to my cousin who convinced me to blind buy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2099913"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2099913#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2099816" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2098284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2098284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2096925" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RegularGuyRants"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439271"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="RegularGuyRants" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2096925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2096925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439271">RegularGuyRants</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 22:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing fragrance. The quality to my surprise is just as advertised, amazing. Also just as advertised, the performance. Very disappointing though i do not regret the purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2096925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2096925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2096050" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="es_paradis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653551"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1653551.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="es_paradis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2096050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2096050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653551">es_paradis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 05:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update after six months: The longevity of the F-batch is laughable. In the summer it's practically a skin scent after an hour, and in spring (I wanted to use it as a spring / fall fragrance) is just slightly better. <br />
<br />
It does smell great, it's as close to a luxurious forest smell you'll ever get, but I'll hardly go for another Creed after this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2096050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2096050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2095441" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CWD333"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1469786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CWD333" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2095441ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2095441" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1469786">CWD333</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-17">03/17/24 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simply my favorite fragrance of all time. People often compare it Cool Water (Chez Bond is a much better alternative for G.I.T IMO). But, although they maybe in the same family? They are totally different. G.I.T is a much better, higher quality fragrance. Its much smoother and performance is better on me as well. Green Irsh Tweed is much more natural and well rounded as well. Also, don't put too much stake into the batch debates. I just got a brand new bottle last month. Yes the batches vary slightly. But its still the same fragrance it's always been to my nose. The opening is great. A super fresh burst of lemon Verbena with green notes. Dry down the turns into a fresh, smooth, and super clean combination of green notes/woodsy notes. Projection on me is very good (over an arm's length easily). Silage is also very impressive for me (man people say it sits in the room with them after I've left). Longevity although not beast mode is still pretty good. I tend to get 8 to 10 hours out of this on my skin. Simply put this is a very clean, sophisticated,  masculine, and timeless fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2095441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2095441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091821" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Tested a new batch in store.  Lasted 6 hrs.  Without the classic powdery dry down I remember.<br />
<br />
Bought a 2015 batch.  10 hrs.  Projecting for 6.  And the dry down is amazing.  Insane sillage all day.<br />
<br />
Just a grown man cologne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2091821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2091821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2090670" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
