padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745381">SnobDecimator</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 21:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yeah bud (LostSock below me), cuz the general public go around recognizing cool water on ppl. The "average person" doesnt even wear cologne, let alone identify cool water in its dry down. Seems very legit bud.<br />
<br />
My friend with a severe learning disability also confuses all green cars and thinks they're the same because they're both green - even though one is a corolla and the other is a vintage corvette. It makes me wonder why I even appreciate/ride my corvette because of this friend's clearly sophisticated opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2082515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2082515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2082492" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LostSock"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1500461.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LostSock" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-pour-Homme-2003-691.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.691.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"title="Gucci pour Homme (2003)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2082492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2082492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1500461">LostSock</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 20:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this, yet almost without fail whenever I wear it someone asks if I'm wearing Cool Water. Makes me wonder why I paid £160 for this when I could just wear the £20 CW I've got. This is definitely more refined, but in the air to the average person, it's Cool Water.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2082492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2082492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082485" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2082485" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Casiquire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/942733"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Casiquire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Homme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="L’Homme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2082485ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2082485" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/942733">Casiquire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 20:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is fascinating art. The list of notes is pretty much what you get but there's more to it. The lemon verbena opens nice and green, with some very damp earthy violet leaf coming through. There's an aquatic chemical in the opening and middle but it's tastefully done. There's a clean-clothes element in the middle along with a fantastic iris. Lots of orris butter, this phase is really beautiful. There's often a gorgeous soft purple/green dance toward the late middle between floral and herbal notes. This dries into a nice squeaky clean ambergris and I can sort of tell what they're going for with the sandalwood accord but I wish it were a little more concrete and prominent but I do enjoy what I get.<br />
<br />
My bottle is years old and the fragrance has changed a lot. Don't take all the reformulation talk too seriously--old bottles will always smell better side-by-side and in three years people will be saying *your* bottle was the peak and new bottles are watered down. <br />
<br />
GIT has a reputation for freshness, but I think that oversimplifies it. I actually find this a warm and cozy fragrance. Sure it has a green aquatic freshness to it, but the texture of it feels more like a soft clean blanket. It's a scent to get wrapped up in.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2082485"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2082485#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082008" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2082008" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Iron Chicken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041668"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Iron Chicken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2082008ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2082008" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2041668">Iron Chicken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I used to adore this so much, I must have had 6 bottles. Then something happened last year, the fragrance changed in a bad way. Creed have done something to this and it no longer has 50% of the potency it once had which to me is heartbreaking. I swore I would not purchase again because there is no depth or longevity / projection.<br />
<br />
I experienced the same thing with Aventus. Very poor show Creed - get your shit together and sort this out!!!!<br />
<br />
A real shame</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2082008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2082008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2080856" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2080856" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentence1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536161"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1536161.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentence1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2080856ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2080856" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536161">Scentence1991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-03">03/03/24 08:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not for me.<br />
<br />
Overall. 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2080856"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2080856#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079363" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Thameen/Chords-91003.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91003.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chords"title="Chords"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716">Glyph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-01">03/01/24 17:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've noticed that even people who think Creed is an overrated house seem to agree on the particular excellence of Green Irish Tweed. It's been described as the equivalent of walking through the Irish countryside and that's exactly what it feels like: it's as green as green can be, and the violet leaf and lemon verbena carry everything before it. <br />
<br />
It's unfortunate that this is pretty expensive since it's so wonderful--this is one of the all-time finest men's fragrances, period. Wearing this makes me feel both peaceful and uplifted, which is what this type of a great scent should do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2079363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2079363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2078690" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JustasL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591936"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1591936.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JustasL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Himalaya-465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himalaya"title="Himalaya"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2078690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2078690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591936">JustasL</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-01">03/01/24 02:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green Irish Tweed by Creed is a classic fragrance that has stood the test of time, embodying the essence of the great outdoors with an elegant and sophisticated flair. Upon the first spray, one is greeted with a fresh and invigorating burst of lemon verbena and peppermint. This refreshing opening paves the way for the heart of the fragrance, where the green notes of violet leaves truly shine, capturing the lushness of rolling hillsides and the vibrant life force of spring. The base notes of sandalwood and ambergris add a warm, rich foundation that complements the green, fresh notes, resulting in a scent that is both timeless and contemporary.<br />
It is more than just a fragrance; it’s an experience. It transports the wearer to a verdant Irish landscape, where the air is filled with the promise of new beginnings and the joy of exploration. Its impressive longevity and moderate sillage make it a versatile companion for any occasion, capable of evoking a sense of natural elegance whether worn daily or reserved for special moments.<br />
<br />
As we welcome the first day of spring, Green Irish Tweed by Creed is the perfect fragrance to celebrate the season’s arrival. Its fresh, green notes are a fitting homage to the rejuvenation and renewal that spring brings. So, to all who are celebrating the first day of spring, let’s embrace the new beginnings, the fresh starts, and the endless possibilities that this season symbolizes. May this spring bring you joy, prosperity, and the freshness of new opportunities, much like the timeless elegance of Green Irish Tweed. Happy First Day of Spring! 🌷🌿🌱</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2078690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2078690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2077161" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pavlos St"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297760"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pavlos St" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2077161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2077161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297760">Pavlos St</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 14:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Moderate projection, lasts maximum 6 hours on my skin. Overall very likeable, mass appealing scent which is very identical with Davidoff cool water with some differences in terms of the base aspect which is not so marine but musky.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2077161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2077161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074809" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2074809" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frag1979"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frag1979" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2074809ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2074809" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2034067">Frag1979</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 11:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Seems way weaker than one i bought 5 years ago. Need to re apply after an hour. Great smell for the outdoors. Like a meadow but better.   Not for intimate dates or similar imo.   Opening is amazing but doesnt  smell great on my skin after several hours especially on hot days but its ok. Becomes slightly pungent and sour.  If im paying this much it has to be perfect. Sadly its not. Its just ok.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2074809"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2074809#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2071674" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChickenTacos79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1929367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChickenTacos79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2071674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2071674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1929367">ChickenTacos79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells beautiful.  This is not a massive projector, depending on how you spray, you can expect 2 hours of projection, but then it becomes a long lasting close/almost skin scent. You won't be filling a room 7 hours later but you'll still have a pleasant hint of it left for yourself or anyone that gets close to you.  It's easy to get spoiled by some of the massive projectors out there (Sauvage Elixir this ain't) but don't let that put you off of this.  This is a great, classy fragrance and if you can find it at a reputable discounter, it's worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2071674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2071674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2070190" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Land0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Land0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2070190ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2070190" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396700">Land0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-22">02/22/24 03:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’d rather just dump the cut grass from the bag of my lawn mower all over myself and roll around in it for free instead of paying $350+ for this 3/10 fragrance, would easily last longer as well</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2070190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2070190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2070081" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nicolas2003"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1050078"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nicolas2003" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Christopher-Dicas/69-Le-Parfum-50456.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50456.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="69 Le Parfum"title="69 Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2070081ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2070081" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1050078">nicolas2003</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-21">02/21/24 23:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green Irish Tweed is a symphony of masculine opulence unveils itself as an opulent symphony, a fragrant masterpiece that encapsulates the essence of enduring masculinity. As an aficionado of exquisite fragrances, I am captivated by the sublime amalgamation of notes that define this olfactory masterpiece.<br />
<br />
The inaugural notes of Lemon Verbena and Iris orchestrate a prelude of unparalleled freshness and vitality. The zest of lemon intertwines with the earthy richness of iris, crafting a vivacious and enlivening overture that befits every discerning connoisseur. This initial flourish emanates an air of self-assured charm and timeless allure.<br />
<br />
In the heart of Green Irish Tweed, the singular note of Violet Leaf takes center stage, weaving a tapestry of verdant sophistication. The aromatic essence of violet leaf imparts a refined, masculine aura, seamlessly melding with the citrusy top notes. This midsection unfolds as a sonnet of greenery, creating an harmonious composition that is both distinctive and graceful.<br />
<br />
As the fragrance gracefully descends to its base, the notes of Ambergris and Sandalwood emerge in a crescendo of warmth and richness. The velvety embrace of sandalwood intertwines with the suave, animalic allure of ambergris, forming a foundation that persists throughout the day. This sumptuous and intricate base serves as the magnum opus, leaving an indelible signature that is simultaneously memorable and irresistible.<br />
<br />
Green Irish Tweed, with its meticulously curated notes, emanates an enduring sophistication that transcends fleeting trends. The fragrance is an ode to classical masculinity, a consummate companion for the contemporary gentleman who values understated elegance. Whether donned for a day in the boardroom or an evening soirée, Green Irish Tweed elevates every moment, leaving an enduring impression of refined and dignified masculinity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2070081"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2070081#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2069799" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sibumi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681232"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1681232.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sibumi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/French-Lover-1022.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1022.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="French Lover"title="French Lover"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2069799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2069799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1681232">Sibumi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-21">02/21/24 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a rare, pleasant day in London. You are heading for your barber appointment, as you do every Friday. You are a man of your habits. The barber, who also serviced your father, knows the topography of your face and your head as well as his way to the pub. And you're done in no time: a dusting off your neck with powder, a spritz of cologne, and you're good to go. <br />
It is getting hotter; the sun gently touches your cheeks, reminding you of a long-gone first love, whose name you can't remember.<br />
Suddenly, a gust of wind brings you the smell of a flowering field in the heart of the city. <br />
Violet, her name was Violet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2069799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2069799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I don't get the insane hype for this at all super disappointing</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2069781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2069781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2067251" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mikebardenpiano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1853829.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="mikebardenpiano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Eau-de-Parfum-48100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"title="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2067251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2067251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853829">mikebardenpiano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 11:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wasn't convinced about this when I first got it, but the more I have and use it, the more I love it. It's unique, high quality, refreshing, addictive, and fresh/uplifting. I don't normally get compliments on my frags, but I walked into the clinic for labs this morning and the lady said "oh, you smell good!" Yeah, I love this one more and more as time goes on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2067251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2067251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064448" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064448" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CarelessWhisper"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2016597"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CarelessWhisper" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-Eau-de-Parfum-75182.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75182.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hero Eau de Parfum"title="Hero Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064448ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064448" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2016597">CarelessWhisper</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells indeed like Davidoff's Cool Water EdT. Maybe a little more refined  than Cool Water but that's about it. If you like one, you'll also like the other. It smells a little bit dated to me. If you already have it, rock it, but do not repurchase because it is way overpriced for what it is. If you really like the scent profile go with Cool Water and apply a few sprays more. Performace on me was very good. I applied 3 sprays at the store and could even smell it the next day (probably 20 hours later). Projection was about right, like you want it to be. I think if you really wanna get noticed 5 sprays will do the trick. This would make a great signature scent and can be worn year round. The all black bottle is classy as hell. I see a man who is at least 30 wearing this. Personally I like classy scents but am not the Cool Water kinda guy so I would go with something different. Nevertheless this is a good fragrance and I would give it (objectively) a 8/10 but for my personal taste it is just okay.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2064448"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2064448#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Higher quality than predecessors or dupes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2064408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2064408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061504" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The smell is very mature and masculine. It smells like grass, citrus, and morning dew to me. It smells like a walk in the woods of the northwest after a light rain. Very specific but that's how it smells to me. Price is outrageous for this stuff. Price of Creed is criminal and they need to lower their prices eventually. I would call this a great casual daytime/office scent that could be used for any occasion if someone desired. Extremely versatile.<br />
<br />
Cant be a 10/10 because of price - so 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2061504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2061504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like it way better than I thought I would, from just testing it on the back of my hand. So rich, yet fresh and pleasing… and so well-composed. No accident it's been around since 1985. Definitely has a springtime vibe, although I still see it as a good year-round scent, as it has plenty of density. It’s expensive as heck…. but personally I'd still pay for this over Cool Water, which has settled to the bottom of my drawer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2057463"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2057463#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not bad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2056783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2056783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2053978" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="somedude12345"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="somedude12345" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2053978ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2053978" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1766248">somedude12345</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-06">02/06/24 10:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>absolutely lovely. perhaps a little overprice with run of the mill performance, but the scent is truly beautiful. it smells like the shower gel id imagine a billionaire would use. people say its too mature for people in their 20s, but I totally disagree. it has enough of the "blue" dna to appeal to the youth and enough substance to appeal to the older crowd. a great fragrance that would actually be worth the 250 or so dollars you can find it at discounters for if the performance was a little better... which is saying something because most creeds just arnt worth the money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2053978"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2053978#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051260" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051260" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="atticus1990"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1682103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1682103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="atticus1990" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051260ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051260" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1682103">atticus1990</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 14:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Outdated and overhyped, but still good.<br />
Reminds me of an 90s fougere.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2051260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2051260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050973" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050973" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Harmonist/Hypnotizing-Fire-36700.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36700.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotizing Fire"title="Hypnotizing Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050973ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050973" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538">Kyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-03">02/03/24 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is FANTASTIC!<br />
<br />
I don’t agree with the people that say this is a suit up multimillionaire kind of fragrance only, while of course this would perfectly fit a CEO I don’t think it is ONLY for them, it’s way more versatile than that. <br />
<br />
The smell itself is marvelous, it’s green, fresh, woody, kind of mossy and has a nostalgic edge to it. <br />
If I had to describe it as a place it would be a rainforest in Ireland on a spring cloudy day. It is a serious kind of fragrance but I still think it’s completely versatile and many people could rock this as long as they’re not the “playful” kind. <br />
<br />
One of the most accurate names I’ve seen in a fragrance, it is definitely green, it does smell like Ireland, and I do see it in someone using a tweed jacket. <br />
<br />
Best from Creed, still 100% worth to this day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2050973"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2050973#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Opening with hits of floral and ambergris immediately made this feel elevated from what most people were wearing. I still have my og bottle to this day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2050946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2050946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jdvice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jdvice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Legend-Eau-de-Parfum-62583.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62583.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Legend Eau de Parfum"title="Legend Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947247">jdvice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 17:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to love this scent.
