Creed has to do something about the performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2049349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2049349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046899" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046899" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PapaTLooch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361586"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1361586.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PapaTLooch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046899ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046899" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361586">PapaTLooch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-30">01/30/24 12:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sprayed this generously on my arm at Neiman today and couldn't believe how poor the performance was. Less than three hours later I could barely smell it. Smelled great but I would never pay retail for the current formulation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2046899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2046899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2045461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2045461" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlessandroVil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/190601"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.190601.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlessandroVil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2045461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2045461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/190601">AlessandroVil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 04:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green Irish Tweed by Creed stands as a timeless masterpiece that transcends time, encapsulating the essence of a revitalizing stroll through the Irish countryside. Launched 39 years ago, this fragrance still serves as a beacon within the realm of citrus aromatic woody musk scents.<br />
<br />
The invigorating opening is a harmonious symphony, blending lemon verbena and iris into an olfactory explosion that is simultaneously clean, green, and subtly spicy. As the fragrance gracefully evolves, violet leaves join the ensemble, introducing a touch of floral elegance to the composition. Anchoring the olfactory journey, the base notes of ambergris and Mysore sandalwood weave a musky, woody embrace.<br />
<br />
Green Irish Tweed exudes a nostalgic charm, reminiscent of classic elegance without succumbing to a dated allure. Its enduring and timeless nature pays homage to the craftsmanship of perfumery. The delightful interplay between floral notes and woody, powdery accords creates a harmonious olfactory experience.<br />
<br />
Donning Green Irish Tweed is not a mere application of a fragrance; it signifies an immersive journey that uplifts the spirit. The strikingly masculine opening sets the stage for an experience that lingers in the memory. The fragrance's noteworthy longevity and value for money make it a prudent investment for connoisseurs of quality and craftsmanship.<br />
<br />
Beyond being a personal indulgence, Green Irish Tweed transforms into a statement, evoking a sense of well-being and leaving a positive impact on others. It surpasses the realm of being just a scent; it evolves into an ode to the seamless blend of citrus, aromatic, woody, and musky elements—a captivating symphony that resonates with both admirers and wearers. A genuine hymn to the artistry of citrus aromatic woody musk scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2045461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2045461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2041635" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Forand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928128"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1928128.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Forand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2041635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2041635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928128">Forand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-25">01/25/24 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>old money. wanted to love it from the name.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2041635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2041635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2033858" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bizzy1995"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bizzy1995" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2033858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2033858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702">Bizzy1995</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-17">01/17/24 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is really strong fresh, lemony and green smell. Dies down to a slightly salty, airy almost grass like scent. This reminds me of springtime. A beautiful, timeless fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2033858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2033858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032671" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="becham54"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932764"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1932764.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="becham54" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Uden-Overdose-52433.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52433.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uden Overdose"title="Uden Overdose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032671ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032671" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932764">becham54</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 11:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It has a very cheap scent compared to its price, you would never pay that much for this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2032671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2032671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2032214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Crusader Smitty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297659"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1297659.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Crusader Smitty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted"title="The Most Wanted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1297659">Crusader Smitty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-16">01/16/24 00:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Been using GIT since 2019. Been fortunate to own bottles from 2005, 2011,13,15,15,17, 19,21&amp;F batch.<br />
<br />
My favorite batches are from 2005, 16 and 17. I own 2X 250ml 17Y01 Flacons, which is my grail GIT. It is just right, as for the F batches well.... I tried a couple of Aventus batches and felt hopeful based off this. So I got a bottle of an F batch and the best part is the metal cap. <br />
<br />
Prehaps it needs maceration but it definitely lacks all round for me, I hate to say it but GIT has died. It lacks that initial bright ozonic punch, great drydown and performance. <br />
<br />
If you can get a bottle before 2020, get it if you enjoy GIT. My 19Y01 was good stuff. <br />
<br />
F batches have the scent but it is not popping, smooth, vibrant with good performance. It's a shame because it really is such a great fragrance. This is a hands down versatile, vibrant, approachable, simple yet unique 'just right- processional scent. Inoffensive and ladies over 20+ love this, just make sure you shower properly!<br />
<br />
10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2032214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2032214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2031779" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; quality:6.5<br />

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1920444">Kinuha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-14">01/14/24 16:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Do you like cool water, then you don't need to buy it, there is a serious difference between the price and at this price my preference would be cool water. If we eliminate the price issue, it is definitely among my favorites in the summer and I see that it preserves the freshness in a tremendously good way, I hear that some people around me cannot get the same performance in the same product, I don't know much about this issue, but I myself am definitely a fresh summer scent that can be bought if the price issue is not a problem.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2030982"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2030982#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2030433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2030433" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="St.0cky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927431"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1927431.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="St.0cky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2030433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2030433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927431">St.0cky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-14">01/14/24 03:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has to be arguably one of the top 5 fragrances ever created.  Its past the point of masterpiece its a grail imho.  Hats off to Bourdon.<br />
<br />
And to anyone talking about coolwater, please.  Stop.  <br />
I grew up with coolwater. My dad used it every night after shaving.  <br />
<br />
It lasts like 2 hrs max.  Barely projects.  Is aquatic not grassy.  Its basically an aftershave.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="2030433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=2030433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="474" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1148016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1148016" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wizebag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1214050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1214050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wizebag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Egoiste-Platinum-614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Egoiste Platinum"title="Egoiste Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1148016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1148016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1214050">Wizebag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-21">02/21/20 23:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There’s a lot of talk about GIT vs Cool Water. <br />
I will clear this up by drawing a music analogy, as the art of sound is often mirrored by the art of scent. <br />
<br />
They are both playing the same song (“Greensleeves”, perhaps?) But, while CW is a rudimentary performance by a middle-schooler on a Casio keyboard, GIT is being performed by a world-class pianist on a Steinway grand in a concert hall.  <br />
<br />
The “notes”  (iris, verbena etc) are the same, but there is more clarity, depth, nuance, dynamics, and projection in the GIT. It  is obviously a higher quality, and the notes resonate together in harmonic bliss. The CW version is unmoving and linear, while GIT will have you escape to another dimension; especially in the opening. <br />
<br />
So does it smell like Cool Water (or vice-versa)? It does. Does it therefore have the same emotional appeal? No. <br />
<br />
For those reviewers going on about how “The world has moved past this 80’s smell blablabla..It's dated...." Has the world moved on from Mozart? Bach? No, that's why it's "classical". <br />
<br />
 What’s good is good. The only question is, “Can you pull it off?”</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="1148016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=1148016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent835171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc835171" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OKcololo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/793395"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.793395.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="OKcololo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Antiheros-4508.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4508.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Antiheros"title="Antiheros"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma835171ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd835171" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/793395">OKcololo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-24">06/24/17 05:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Here's what pisses me off about Creed: all their awful gimmicks.<br />
<br />
1) The claim that it's a family perfumery, and that all the perfumes are composed by the Creed's: FALSE.<br />
<br />
This one for instance, was actually composed by the great Pierre Bourdon, who would go on to compose Cool Water, which this strongly resembles.<br />
<br />
Of course, he remains uncredited.<br />
<br />
2) The pretense that all of their fragrances contain the most exquisite, hand picked materials: FALSE.<br />
<br />
Though good, Green Irish Tweed is clearly composed mostly of synthetic ingredients like white musks, dihydromyrcenol, ambroxan, octyn esters, and so on.<br />
<br />
Their claim to pure unfettered luxury is thus embarassing and ridiculous.<br />
<br />
3) The claim that these fragrances are hundreds of years old and that they were worn by princes and princesses: FALSE.<br />
<br />
Most of the materials in Green Irish Tweed didn't even exist 100 years ago.<br />
<br />
Hence, the vainglorious pretentiousness of the Creed line spoils the fun of their few good perfumes (case in point: Green Irish Tweed).<br />
<br />
Creed should stop all the pointless costume dress nonsense and start crediting their perfumers, making new interesting fragrances, and using more natural ingredients. Period.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="835171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=835171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent823476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc823476" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1039210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma823476ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd823476" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039210">Thane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-17">05/17/17 07:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I die, I don't want a fancy funeral, but I do want someone to empty a whole bottle of this into my coffin, because this is the best damn thing I've ever smelled.  It smells like angel farts.  It's like a vacation in a bottle.  It's on the short list of things to grab if my house is on fire.  I want to spray directly up my nose onto my brain so I can smell it all the time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="823476"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=823476#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent636491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc636491" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samofthesouth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/932925"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.932925.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samofthesouth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Davidoff/Davidoff-1333.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1333.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Davidoff"title="Davidoff"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma636491ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd636491" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/932925">samofthesouth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-10-06">10/06/15 14:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A purple and green dream, that goes way beyond Ireland and soars for the stratosphere.<br />
<br />
A timeless feeling of sweet and beguiling masculinity is created upon each deep Inhalation. <br />
<br />
The price is obscene, but the feeling of well-being that it brings me is priceless.<br />
<br />
Green Irish Tweed helps old ladies cross the road, buys their shopping, and makes them a nice cup of tea.<br />
<br />
He gives children a high five, makes them feel cool, and keeps them laughing all day.<br />
<br />
He gives the cynics a welcome hug.<br />
<br />
He gives the gangster a shoulder to cry on.<br />
<br />
He gives the politician a dose of reality.<br />
<br />
He shows the unwanted some love.<br />
<br />
He puts everything in its right place.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="636491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=636491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent894158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc894158" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ky1227"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/950692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.950692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ky1227" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermès"title="Terre d'Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma894158ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd894158" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/950692">Ky1227</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-27">12/27/17 21:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green Irish Tweed has proven itself to be one of the most timeless fragrances ever created. Everything about this perfume is just fantastic. At the top, we get an invigorating blast of fresh, clean, green, and subtle spicy notes. These top notes will continue into the mid, but you will also start picking up on some wonderful floral notes that soften up at the base with some nice woody and powdery accords. There is also something musky, possibly the ambergris, that makes this lean masculine, though women could pull it off. <br />
<br />
Green Irish Tweed has a nostalgic vibe, but never smells dated or overly mature. It smells classic, but not necesarily barbershop or old-school forgere-like. It’s hard to pin-down, but there is something so wonderfully gentleman and polished about this. I think is best suited ages 18 and up so most could pull it off.<br />
<br />
As for occasion, this is incredibly versatile. I think it works best on spring days, but there is not a time or season when this cannot be worn. Perfect for work and casual day-time wear, but I wear this on nights out as well. <br />
<br />
One area where GIT shines is performance. I can spray this on before work at the 7am, and it will be there until at least 4 pm guaranteed. Projects very well for at least 4 hours so expect compliments.<br />
<br />
Another thing worth mentioning about GIT, or any Creed Fragrance for that matter, is the price. This stuff is not cheap, especially if bought from an official Creed retailer. If you don’t want to spend that much money, there are definitely alternatives. The best alternative would be Armafs Tres Nuit, they are VERY close. Many also swear that this is similar to Davidoffs Cool Water. I always thought there were many differences, but they do share something in common.<br />
<br />
Overall, Green Irish Tweed by Creed earns an easy 10 out of 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="894158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=894158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="474" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">

    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent775850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc775850" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Joeyvice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/269380"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.269380.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Joeyvice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/B-Men-706.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.706.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="B*Men"title="B*Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma775850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd775850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/269380">Joeyvice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-12-30">12/30/16 14:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am ready to be thrown in the fire, but I went to a fragrance store back in October in San Antonio. I saw they had all the Creed fragrances, and I was like "FINALLY, I GET TO SMELL THESE LEGENDARY BEASTS!" Well, GIT was among them, I sprayed it on a tester strip, and my wrist...and man...I just don't see how this is so iconic. It smelled like a fresh cut yard to me, and that was that. I mean, it definitely didn't smell synthetic of anything, but it wasn't something I could see being enjoyable to wear. It made an impression on me, but only because I was so excited to finally get to smell this, and ended up being extremely let down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="775850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=775850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1703551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1703551" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jaybrown241"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1578472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1578472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jaybrown241" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1703551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1703551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1578472">jaybrown241</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-06">12/06/22 14:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>VERY Poor quality since 2020 when Creed was sold to the  Black Rock hedge fund who has no clue about fragrances, BUT does know how to dilute and cheapen formulas to INCREASE profits! <br />
<br />
Black Rock is also scamming people to invest in ESG (environmental Social Governance!) <br />
<br />
So many other fragrances to buy that leaves Creed in a vapor of dust!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="1703551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=1703551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1036583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1036583" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mustination"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184847"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1184847.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mustination" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1036583ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1036583" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1184847">mustination</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-01">03/01/19 06:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The magic of this fragrance is in the opening. it's very 3D-like and it takes you to a journey. It takes you to an irish country side that just rained. Wet, grassy, and added lemon verbena note and rounded with a touch of iris, absolutely stunning opening(very masculine as well). <br />
OPENING 10/10 <br />
<br />
<br />
  After 4 hours, you get to the mid-, where you start to get a beautiful combination of sandalwood, violet leaf, and ambergris, that is just gorgeous. Now, here is where it starts to smell similar to davidoff cool water. I would say with 60% similarity. For sure, most noses will be able tell  the difference quite easily due to the difference in the formula and the quality of the ingredients.<br />
MID: 9/10<br />
<br />
<br />
  After 7-8 hours, you start getting into to the dry down, now, here is where it starts to smell really close to davidoff cool water with approximately 80% similarity. When the fragrance is in the air there is almost no difference, however, if you dig your nose to where you sprayed it, you will smell the difference in the quality of the ingredients. Green Irish Tweed has more pronounced notes whilst david-off cool water's more blurry. (Like you watch a movie in 1080p-Green Irish Tweed and 360p-Davidoff Cool Water) <br />
DRY-DOWN 9/10 <br />
<br />
 All in all, an incredible fragrance that is worth all the hype it gets, very versatile(Spring/Summer/Fall-can be), and masculine.<br />
<br />
Personally 10/10 :) <br />
Subjectively 9.3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="1036583"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=1036583#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1376782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1376782" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steven221283"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steven221283" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1376782ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1376782" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360486">Steven221283</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-16">07/16/21 04:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just got a 5ml sample of this... And yeah it just smells like my memory of Cool Water. It's been a while since I smelled that stuff, but I'm pretty sure this is exactly what is smelled like. Basically, this smells like the 90s. I'm sure it was probably very special when it first came out, it's clearly a classic, but for 2021 it's a pass from me. Way too expensive anyway, at least Cool Water is cheap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="1376782"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=1376782#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent226700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc226700" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kbro4897"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/179645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.179645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kbro4897" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-Vintage/Pineapple-Vintage-Intense-VI-82440.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82440.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pineapple Vintage Intense VI."title="Pineapple Vintage Intense VI."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma226700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd226700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/179645">kbro4897</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-02-22">02/22/12 12:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scent        5/10<br />
Projection   6/10<br />
Longevity    8/10<br />
Value        1/10<br />
Overall      20/40<br />
<br />
What can I say about GIT that hasn't been said already? Green Irish Tweed and Cool Water are fraternal brothers. Not identical, but very similar. The biggest difference; $174 vs. $38. If you don't have lots of money to throw around, buy Cool Water and tell people it's Green Irish Tweed, because the average Joe (or Josephine) won't be able to tell the difference.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="474"comment_id="226700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html?ccid=226700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="474" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="474":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="474" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_footer" v-pre>

        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"

                    <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
            <div class="sticky"
                 data-sticky
                 style="margin-left: -0.65rem; margin-top: 2rem;"
                 data-top-anchor="anchormehere45646:bottom"
                 data-btm-anchor="popBrands:top"
            >
                <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x600" id="fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
            </div>
                <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
    
</div>
    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

    let md5_mfga_js = "e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11";

    let toLocale = "en";
    let canonical_domain = "www.fragrantica.com";
    let member_folder = "member";
    let designers_folder = "designers";
    let perfumes_folder = "perfume";
    let news_folder = "news";
    let autoFocus = false;
    window.Lightnews = {  };
    let channelName = "www-en-fr-public";
    let presenceChannelName = "presence-www-en-fr";
    let presenceEventName = "logged-users-www-en-fr";
    let privateChannelName = "private-www-en-fr-1";
    let EventNameFr = "private-notifications-www-en-fr";
    let eventName = "en-livefeed";
    let symbol = "en";
    let use_notifications = 0;
    let user_logged =  0;
    let user_id =  1;
    let xml_lang = "EN";
    let admin = 0;
    let moderator = 0;
    let image_perfumes_path = "https://fimgs.net/";
        //langVars or any other variable that we want to 'See' in Vue has to be defined BEFORE

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
